name: Half-Life: Escape 2.0
storyline:
You are Dr. James West, specialist in portal technology, is on the way to your workplace until suddenly the unthinkable happens. The experiment in the Anomalous Materials fails. Panic breaks out everywhere, alien creatures overrun the facility. The army doesn't seem to have come to save everyone either. Together with some colleagues, Dr. West searching a way out of the facility. Will you make it?

Enter familiar and new areas of the Black Mesa Research Facility and fight your way to freedom. But don't forget, this time your protective suit can't protect you! Half-Life Escape 2.0 is the remastered version of Escape 1 and Escape 2. Both mods have been merged and reworked to deliver the ultimate Half-Life experience.
summary: A new episode from the Half-Life Universe!
